author: James Zetlen <james_zetlen@volusion.com> (volusion.com) forked from Stephen Sugden <stephen@betsmartmedia.com> (betsmartmedia.com)
name: uri-template-w-unescaped
description: Parse and expand URI templates as defined by http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-gregorio-uritemplate-08, with the additional, non-RFC {%unescaped} expression
